Articles.Content:
The kerbals are at war with the crawfish! But they are not alone. They have their massive army of killer crabs as backup! While the kerbals are smarter, faster, and stronger, the crawfishes' army are too many. The end of kerbalkind is nigh...

Or rather, was nigh.

For a team of highly intelligent kerbal avionics design specialists, lead by Wernher von Kerman have designed a new plane.

A plane that will turn the tide of battle! This plane is now being mass produced by C7 Avionics Industries and you can get yours today, for only 9.95 million kerbdollars!

It can be used as a kamikaze bomber, a carpet bomber and fast-reaction strike plane.

Obligatory pictures:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Instructions ahead!

To use it as a strike plane:

1. Fly normally

2. Target enemy

3. Engage Lazor system

4. Hit space to fire missile, there are 6.

To use it as a carpet bomber:

1. Fly normally

2. Get close to enemies

3. When right above enemy, hit 1.

4. FLY FOR YOUR LIIIIFE!!

To use it as a kamikaze bomber

1. Fly normally.

2. Dock with ground near enemy at 100 m/s

To land:

1. Make sure landing gear is out

2. Approach flat ground or landing slowly, try to point as close to the horizon as possible

3. When below 500m above ground, cut engines

4. When below 100m above ground, keep prograde marker between the -5deg marker and the horizon

5. After touchdown, tap the brakes in very short bursts, a second per burst max.

Download:

http://www./view/5xhmusdruo3okhr/The%20shark%20(Assault%20UAV).craft

Mods required: Lazor system, Lazor weapons
